titleStmt.title: A copy of a prophecy, sent to the late honourable Algernoon Sydney Esq; in the year 1666. from Montpelliers to B. Furly of Rotterdam, and by him accidentally found among old papers, Febr. 18/28. 1689.
titleStmt.author: Sidney, Algernon, 1622-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and are to be sold by Richard Janeway in Queens-head-alley in Pater-noster-row,

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing S3760A, reel 2520, of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books 1641-1700.
Cf. Wing S3760A which gives a different title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
